name: Dragon Eel
description: The Dragon Eel combines the fearsome traits of a dragon with the unique abilities of an aquatic creature, exuding majesty and raw power.
memorable: Its ability to deal significant lightning damage and move effortlessly between water and air makes it a formidable opponent.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate aquatic territories and can be found using its storm abilities to its advantage during combat.
relations: Related closely to other dragon types, it may be encountered alongside marine creatures or during storms.
environment: Commonly found in aquatic environments, particularly in stormy conditions.
strengths: Immunity to lightning damage and paralysis, along with strong melee attacks and flight during storms.
weaknesses: Moderate dexterity may hinder agility in combat, making it potentially less evasive.
attacks: Can deliver devastating multiattacks with bites and tail slaps, both dealing bludgeoning and additional lightning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath, which unleashes a massive area of lightning damage and can impact multiple targets.
senses: Has a passive Perception score of 15, providing good threat detection.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, Athletics, Insight, and Perception, enhancing its combat and navigation abilities.
additional_information: Limited Amphibiousness allows it to breathe underwater and in air.
Shocking Hide retaliates against melee attacks with lightning damage.
Storm Glide grants flying speed during storms, improving maneuverability.
test_queries: giant aquatic creature with shocking abilities
formidable eel that can fly in storms
